ModulePrefs.title: Google News Reader
ModulePrefs.description: A simple, sophisticated newsreader app with core focus on usability.
ModulePrefs.author: Siddique Hameed
ModulePrefs.author_aboutme: I am an aspiring entrepreneur who loves crafting software both for living and hobbies. Still searching for the perfect click of my life...
ModulePrefs.author_quote: World Wide Web is a sea of HTML, you never know what you gonna catch!
